title: Jaws Hits Theaters
description:
June 20, 1975. Steven Spielberg's thriller Jaws is released in theaters and becomes the highest grossing movie of all time, creating the genre of the “summer blockbuster”.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
